posts.post_content:
Up for sale is an extremely nice 1870's CDV featuring an unknown ballplayer from a team from Chester, NY. The Front is impeccable, while the back has some paper loss limited to areas not affecting any of the photographers info. The photographer was located in Goshen, NY (which is right next door to Chester). Great early Baseball image. Shown below at roughly actual size

Price is $295 shipped.

[IMG]http://starsofthediamond.com/cdvchesterny.JPG[/IMG]
Oh man I'm from Goshen, NY. If the deal falls through please let me know.

[quote name="packs" post=762142]Oh man I'm from Goshen, NY. If the deal falls through please let me know.[/QUOTE]

Just look for it on eBay next week.
